about_the_game:
D.N.A: Do Not Answer

About this Game:
D.N.A is our debut PC game, a story-driven (or interactive drama) horror experience. Mainly developed by a small team of three passionate creators at Well of Tales, this short and intense game is offered for free as an introduction to our walk in the game industry.

Plot Summary:
You play as Alice, a young nurse who wakes up in an apparently abandoned hospital. As you navigate this eerie setting, you find your phone, charged to just 7%, which becomes your only source of light in the increasingly dark and twisted corridors. As Alice explores the hospital, she uncovers clues to piece together her fragmented memories while striving to escape. Beware, the longer you stay in the dark, the greater the chance the lurking presence will catch you.





Gameplay:
D.N.A is a first-person horror game where each decision can lead to a different ending. As Alice, your mission is to escape the hospital, recover your memories, and avoid succumbing to the darkness. The game alternates between intense gameplay and cinematic scenes, ensuring a deeply engaging experience.





Game Features:

Immersive Storytelling: A gripping narrative that pulls you into Alice's mysterious and terrifying predicament.

Atmospheric Exploration: Traverse a hospital that transforms from seemingly clean and abandoned to a decaying, metaphysical nightmare.

Strategic Gameplay: Conserve your phone’s battery by finding charging stations to survive the encroaching darkness.

Multiple Endings: Your choices shape Alice's fate, leading to different outcomes based on your gameplay.

High-Quality Production: Enjoy a photorealistic and immersive environment created with Unity 3D, featuring professional voice acting by Elisabeth Yorke Bolognini and original soundtrack.


Will you help Alice find the way out, or will the darkness claim her?

name: D.N.A: Do Not Answer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400F (2.9GHZ)
  • Graphics: nvidia gtx 1050ti (4gb)
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12500 (3.0GHZ)
  • Graphics: nvidia gtx 2060 (6gb)
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: "D.N.A is a short first-person, story-driven horror game developed by a small idipendent studio. Players navigate an eerie, abandoned hospital, uncover clues, manage limited light sources, and face a dark presence. Featuring multiple endings, realistic graphics, and immersive sound design."
